result.content:
Contents:

QaTip.Fitnesse.Demo.DoTestFixture

definition


variable defined: DictionaryPath=C:\temp\Dictionaries
variable defined: RuleMetadataPath=C:\temp\RuleMetadataFiles
variable defined: EnableXsrfVerification=N
variable defined: DictionarySourcePath=C:\RFMDEFAULTDICTIONARY


Scenario:


1. Stop Service (PROVIDE NAME OF SERVICE)

ManageServices
ServiceName StopService? Output
Jenkins SUCCESS No Issues. Jenkins was already stopped.


2. Get current configuration and save it to Variable so that you can reset back to orginal when test is ready to tear down

ManageConfigs
ConfigFileName ConfigValue GetConfigSetting() ConfigValue?
C:\backupdata\Training\Training\Fitnesse\ConfigurationExample\configruationexample.config DictionaryPath >>DictionaryPath C:\temp\Dictionaries DictionaryPath
C:\backupdata\Training\Training\Fitnesse\ConfigurationExample\configruationexample.config RuleMetadataPath >>RuleMetadataPath C:\temp\RuleMetadataFiles RuleMetadataPath

ManageConfigs
ConfigFileName ConfigValue GetConfigSetting() ConfigValue?
C:\backupdata\Training\Training\Fitnesse\ConfigurationExample\configruationexample.config PermissionOn >>Permission false PermissionOn




3. Set New Configuration

Manage Configs
ConfigFileName ConfigValue Target Value SetConfigSetting() GetConfigSetting()?
C:\backupdata\Training\Training\Fitnesse\ConfigurationExample\configruationexample.config DictionaryPath C:\temp\Dictionaries void >>DictionaryPath C:\temp\Dictionaries
C:\backupdata\Training\Training\Fitnesse\ConfigurationExample\configruationexample.config RuleMetadataPath C:\temp\RuleMetadataFiles void >>RuleMetadataPath C:\temp\RuleMetadataFiles
C:\backupdata\Training\Training\Fitnesse\ConfigurationExample\configruationexample.config PermissionOn false void >>permission false


4. Restart Service
ManageServices
ServiceName StartService? Output
Jenkins SUCCESS No Issues. Started Jenkins.

<test page>
QaTip.Fitnesse.Demo.DoTestFixture
variable defined: Resturl=http://www.thomas-bayer.com/sqlrest/

1. Perform a Post Request to rest service


CreateRestApiRequest
Url requestType requestFormat GetRequest Requestresponse? Requeststatus?
http://www.thomas-bayer.com/sqlrest/ GET text null null Accepted expected
null actual


2. Get Response back
3. Validate Response

Contents:

QaTip.Fitnesse.Demo.DoTestFixture

Set back configuration to oringal configuration


ManageServices
ServiceName StopService? Output
Jenkins SUCCESS No Issues. Stopped Jenkins.


Manage Configs
ConfigFileName ConfigValue Target Value GetConfigSetting()? SetConfigSetting() ? GetConfigSetting()?
C:\backupdata\Training\Training\Fitnesse\ConfigurationExample\configruationexample.config PermissionOn <<Permission false false void false
